Audio Description: This dark blue poster with white letters is a message from President Roosevelt. At the top center is an engraving of an eagle with a ribbon in its mouth, standing on a shield with stripes and stars. The eagle is holding four arrows in its right talon and an olive branch in its left. Behind the eagle is a small field of stars. The text of the poster says “…the state of this nation is good, the heart of this nation is sound, the spirit of this nation is strong, the faith of this nation is eternal. Franklin Delano Roosevelt, from his message to Congress, January 7, 1943”
Creator: United States. Office of War Information;
